verbs.description: [V: having] [ARG1: an open marriage] ultimately led to my divorce i remember the moment we met it was a crowded room yet somehow in the midst of all those people our eyes managed to look away from the band on stage and lock onto one another i nervously looked down and then immediately back up at those baby blues of his and almost instantaneously we both smiled and began walking toward each other divorce marriage hall brodie vissers
